divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend was riding bikes in Pelzer South carolina at 7:47pm on sunday april 15,2012 And my friend looked up and said what is that I looked and said I have no idea. The object was hovering right to the left about 500 ft it was black triangle shaped about at a 10:00 angle in the sky not straight up then 8:00pm it was gone.
Summary: I Ryan and my friend micheal seen in the sky about where the air planes fly just hovering then about 8 pm it went away
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pelzer
This sighting has never been favorited.
